backend/main.mo: Main Motoko actor for the Gambia Market backend, defining data types (listings, users, messages, transactions, reviews, reports) and state maps, with mixins for blob storage and authorization.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that transforms old user profiles (with profilePicUrl text field) to new user profiles (with profilePic ExternalBlob field), setting profilePic to null for all existing users.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping implemented features (listing creation flow, profile dashboard, my listings section, etc.) to their relevant frontend files, components, and test IDs with confidence ratings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Auto-generated JSON summaries of all frontend source files, describing the purpose and key contents of each component, page, hook, and data file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark theme color tokens including background, foreground, primary, chart, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point for the Gambia Market PWA, including manifest link, theme color meta tags, iOS/Android PWA support meta tags, and the React root div.
frontend/public/manifest.json: PWA web app manifest for Gambia Market defining app name, display mode, theme colors, orientation, and two icon sizes (192x192 and 512x512).
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker implementing a cache-first strategy for GET requests, caching the app shell on install, cleaning old caches on activate, and falling back to index.html for navigation requests.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing client-side page routing via state, rendering all pages (HomeFeed, Search, CreateListing, EditListing, ListingDetail, Profile, Chat, etc.) and wiring navigation handlers between them.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Sticky top navigation header with logo, search button, sell button, and login/profile actions using Internet Identity authentication and user profile data.
frontend/src/components/AuthGuard.tsx: Wraps children with authentication and profile checks, showing loading states, a login prompt, or profile setup flow as needed before rendering protected content.
frontend/src/components/BoostedListingMo: Visual mockup component comparing a standard listing versus a boosted/sponsored listing, along with pricing tiers, used for illustrative/marketing purposes.
frontend/src/components/BoostModal.tsx: Modal dialog for selecting and purchasing a listing boost option, displaying available duration/price tiers fetched from the backend and submitting via mutation.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: Fixed bottom navigation bar with Home, Search, Sell, Chat, and Profile tabs, including an unread message badge count derived from conversations.
frontend/src/components/CategoryFilter.t: Horizontally scrollable category filter bar that lets users select or clear a listing category using emoji-labeled buttons.
frontend/src/components/ChatMockup.tsx: Static UI mockup of a chat interface showing a listing context header, sample messages, and an input bar, used for demonstration purposes.
frontend/src/components/ConversationItem: Renders a single conversation list item showing the other user's avatar, name, last message, and timestamp, with an unread indicator dot and relative time formatting.
frontend/src/components/DatabaseStructur: Displays the 'Database Structure' section of a blueprint page by rendering a grid of EntityCard components sourced from the database data file.
A controlled form component for editing a user's display name, phone number, and location, with validation and submission via the useUpdateProfile mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/EntityCard.tsx: Renders a database entity as a card with a header, a fields table showing name/type/description, and an optional relationships section.
frontend/src/components/FeatureBreakdown: Renders the 'Core Feature Breakdown' section by iterating over features data and conditionally rendering various mockup sub-components based on each feature's properties.
frontend/src/components/FeatureCard.tsx: Displays a single feature card with a mapped icon, category badge, title, and description for use in the feature breakdown section.
frontend/src/components/FeaturedListings: Renders a horizontally scrollable row of featured/boosted listings with photos, prices, and category emojis, each clickable to navigate to a listing detail.
frontend/src/components/FulfillmentOptio: Displays a grid of fulfillment options (delivery vs. meet-up) as styled cards with icons, descriptions, and sample form fields.
frontend/src/components/FutureFeatureCar: Renders a single future feature card showing its title, description, and a phase badge (Phase 2 or Phase 3) with corresponding color styling.
frontend/src/components/FutureFeaturesSe: Displays the 'Future Features' section split into Phase 2 and Phase 3 groups, each rendered as a grid of FutureFeatureCard components.
Modal dialog that prompts unauthenticated users to enter a display name before sending a message, with an alternative option to sign in via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Hero banner section with a background image, tagline, and CTA buttons for selling or browsing listings, plus static marketplace stats.
frontend/src/components/HomeFeedMockup.t: Renders a responsive grid of sample listing cards with category icons, price, condition badge, and location using mock SampleListing data.
Inline editable field component that toggles between display and input modes, calling an async onSave callback with save/cancel controls.
frontend/src/components/InstallBanner.ts: PWA install prompt banner that handles both Android (beforeinstallprompt) and iOS (manual instructions) install flows, with dismissal persisted to localStorage.
frontend/src/components/JourneyFlow.tsx: Renders a vertical step-by-step user journey flow with icons, numbered steps, and color theming based on the flow's color property.
frontend/src/components/ListingCard.tsx: Clickable card component displaying a marketplace listing with photo or emoji placeholder, price, condition, location, and featured/status badges.
frontend/src/components/ListingCreationC: Renders a grid of listing creation step cards, each displaying a step number, title, icon, and a field mockup (upload, dropdown, number, radio, or location) based on the step's fieldType.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Displays a login prompt UI in either fullpage or inline/card variants, triggering Internet Identity authentication via the useInternetIdentity hook.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Renders a single chat message bubble with sent/received styling, inline edit and delete actions, and displays a 'Message deleted' placeholder for deleted messages.
frontend/src/components/MonetizationSect: Renders the monetization strategy section, highlighting the primary revenue stream with a boosted listing mockup and listing secondary streams in a grid of RevenueCards.
frontend/src/components/MVPPlanSection.t: Renders the MVP plan section with a must-have/nice-to-have feature checklist and an 8-week development timeline using MVPTimeline.
frontend/src/components/MVPTimeline.tsx: Displays a responsive grid of weekly milestone cards, each showing a week label, milestone title, and task checklist with rotating color themes.
frontend/src/components/MyListingCard.ts: Displays a compact card for a user's own listing with thumbnail, title, price, status badge, boost indicator, and action buttons for view, edit, boost, and delete.
frontend/src/components/NavigationTabs.t: Renders a sticky horizontal navigation bar with emoji-labeled tabs for switching between blueprint sections like Features, Database, and Roadmap.
frontend/src/components/PatternDivider.t: A simple decorative divider component that applies a kente pattern CSS class, with an optional thin variant.
frontend/src/components/PaymentMethodsMo: Displays a mockup UI showing selectable payment method cards and transaction status badges, driven by PaymentMethod and TransactionState props.
frontend/src/components/PhotoCarousel.ts: An image carousel component supporting navigation arrows, dot indicators, a photo counter, and a fullscreen overlay for a list of ExternalBlob photos.
frontend/src/components/PhotoUpload.tsx: Handles photo uploads up to a configurable maximum, displaying thumbnails with remove buttons and an add-photo trigger backed by ExternalBlob.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetup.tsx: A modal form for first-time profile setup that collects name, phone, and location, then saves the data via the useSaveCallerUserProfile hook.
Displays a four-column stats row (listings, rating, reviews, followers) with animated count-up numbers on mount.
frontend/src/components/ProfileTabs.tsx: Renders a two-tab panel showing the user's listings (with create/edit/delete actions) and their reviews, including a delete confirmation dialog.
frontend/src/components/RecentSearchChip: Renders a list of recent search terms as dismissible chips with options to click a search, remove individual entries, or clear all.
frontend/src/components/RegistrationFlow: Displays a multi-step registration flow as a vertical timeline of cards, each showing step fields with their placeholders and validation state icons.
frontend/src/components/ReportModal.tsx: Modal dialog that lets a user select a reason and submit a report against a listing, using the useCreateReport mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/RevenueCard.tsx: Displays a single revenue stream card with its type badge, description, and projected impact, highlighting primary streams with a special border and badge.
frontend/src/components/ReviewForm.tsx: Form component for submitting a star rating and optional comment review for a user/listing, using the useCreateReview mutation hook.
frontend/src/components/ReviewsList.tsx: Fetches and renders a list of reviews for a given user, showing reviewer avatar, star rating, comment, and relative timestamp, with loading skeletons and an empty state.
frontend/src/components/RoadmapPhaseCard: Renders a single roadmap phase as a timeline card showing the phase number, timeframe, key deliverables, and success metrics with color-coded styling per phase.
frontend/src/components/RoadmapSection.t: Section component that renders all roadmap phases by mapping over static roadmapPhases data and rendering a RoadmapPhaseCard for each.
frontend/src/components/SearchBar.tsx: Controlled search input with a search icon, Enter-key submit support, and a clear button that appears when the field has a value.
frontend/src/components/SearchFilterMock: Renders a static UI mockup of a search bar with category, price range, and condition filters using provided FilterOptions data.
frontend/src/components/SectionContainer: A reusable layout wrapper that renders a titled section with an optional subtitle and decorative underline, constraining content to a max-width centered container.
frontend/src/components/SellerInfo.tsx: Displays a clickable seller profile card showing avatar, name, verification badge, location, average rating, and follower count fetched via query hooks.
frontend/src/components/SkeletonListingC: A shimmer placeholder card that mimics the layout of a listing card while content is loading.
frontend/src/components/StarRating.tsx: An interactive or read-only star rating component supporting hover effects and three size variants.
frontend/src/components/TechStackCard.ts: Displays a single tech stack item card with a color-coded category badge, technology name, and rationale text.
frontend/src/components/TechStackSection: Renders a grid of TechStackCard components inside a SectionContainer using static techStackItems data.
frontend/src/components/TrustSafetyMocku: Renders a grid of trust and safety mechanism cards (rating, review, report, block) with type-specific interactive mockup UI for each.
frontend/src/components/UserFlowsSection: Displays buyer and seller user journey flows side-by-side on desktop and as a toggled single view on mobile using JourneyFlow components.
frontend/src/components/VerifiedBadgeMoc: Shows a two-panel mockup with a verification process stepper and a sample verified seller profile card including badge image.
frontend/src/components/ZeroResultsState: Displays an empty-state UI when a search returns no results, with a clear-search button and optional suggested category chips.
frontend/src/contexts/ThemeContext.tsx: Provides a React context for light/dark theme management, persisting the user's preference to localStorage and syncing with the system color scheme preference.
frontend/src/data/database.ts: Defines static data for the app's database schema, describing entities (Users, Listings, Messages, Transactions) with their fields, types, and relationships.
frontend/src/data/features.ts: Contains static data describing core app features (e.g., phone registration, listing creation, nearby feed) including UI flow steps, fields, and sample listings.
frontend/src/data/futureFeatures.ts: Defines a list of planned future features (e.g., AI recommendations, escrow, voice search) organized by development phase (Phase 2 or 3).
frontend/src/data/index.ts: Barrel file that re-exports all data modules (features, userFlows, database, techStack, mvpPlan, futureFeatures, monetization, roadmap) from a single entry point.
frontend/src/data/monetization.ts: Defines revenue stream data including boosted listings, seller subscriptions, transaction fees, and sponsorships, with pricing tiers and projected impact descriptions.
frontend/src/data/mvpPlan.ts: Specifies the MVP feature list with priorities (must-have vs. nice-to-have) and an 8-week development timeline broken into four milestone phases.
frontend/src/data/roadmap.ts: Defines a four-phase product roadmap (Foundation through Scale) spanning 12 months, each with deliverables and measurable success metrics.
frontend/src/data/techStack.ts: Defines and exports an array of tech stack items for the Gambia Market app, each describing a technology category, choice, and rationale tailored for low-bandwidth and local payment constraints.
frontend/src/data/userFlows.ts: Defines and exports buyer and seller user journey flows, each as a sequence of labeled steps with icons and descriptions for the Gambia Market app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, invalidating dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGetCallerUserProfi: Re-exports the useGetCallerUserProfile hook from useQueries as a convenience alias.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing DFINITY Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Centralizes all React Query hooks for the app, covering user profiles, listings, reviews, and messaging with associated mutations and cache invalidation logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useUnreadMessageCount: Provides a hook to compute the number of unread messages for the current user by comparing conversation timestamps against localStorage-persisted last-viewed times.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global CSS custom properties for the Sunrise Market design system (light and dark themes), imports fonts, and adds Tailwind utility classes including gradients and animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/Chat.tsx: Displays a list of the authenticated user's conversations, grouped by unique user-listing pairs and sorted by most recent message. Shows a login prompt if unauthenticated, loading skeletons while fetching, or an empty state if no conversations exist.
frontend/src/pages/CreateListing.tsx: Form page for creating a new marketplace listing with fields for title, description, category, price, condition, location, and photos, including real-estate-specific fields. Validates input, calls the createListing mutation, and redirects on success or shows a login prompt if unauthenticated.
frontend/src/pages/EditListing.tsx: Form page for editing an existing listing, pre-populating fields from the fetched listing data and submitting updates via the updateListing mutation. Supports all listing fields including real-estate subcategory options, and shows a login prompt if unauthenticated.
frontend/src/pages/HomeFeed.tsx: Main home page displaying a hero section, a featured/boosted listings row, a category filter, and a responsive grid of active listings. Filters listings by selected category and shows skeleton cards while loading.
frontend/src/pages/ListingDetail.tsx: Detail page for a single listing showing a photo carousel, title, price, metadata, seller info, reviews, and a message/report action bar. Distinguishes between the listing owner and other users to conditionally render actions.
frontend/src/pages/MessageThread.tsx: Real-time message thread page between the current user and another user for a specific listing, supporting both authenticated and anonymous (guest name) message sending. Auto-scrolls to the latest message and shows a guest name prompt when an unauthenticated user tries to send.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: Displays the authenticated user's profile page with avatar upload, stats, reviews, and listings, showing login prompt or profile setup if needed.
frontend/src/pages/PublicProfile.tsx: Renders a public-facing profile page for a given user Principal, showing their info, active listings, and reviews.
frontend/src/pages/Search.tsx: Search page with a search bar, recent searches stored in localStorage, popular category chips, and a results list of matching listings.
frontend/src/types/blueprint.ts: TypeScript type definitions for the app blueprint, covering features, user flows, database entities, tech stack items, and MVP planning structures.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, with sessionStorage persistence support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom fonts (Sora, Plus Jakarta Sans), CSS-variable-based color tokens, border radii, box shadows, keyframe animations, and plugins including tailwindcss-animate.
project_state.json: Project state manifest (version 3) describing a listings/marketplace app, tracking existing features, known issues (broken listing creation), and requirements for profile, listings management, and reviews pages.
